verbs.description: [ARG0: Emmanuel Macron and Trump] [V: exchanged] [ARG1: another awkward handshake] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARGM-LOC: at the G7 Summit in Quebec] . And this time Macron 's grip left pale marks on Trump 's hand .

Emmanuel Macron and Trump exchanged another awkward handshake Friday at the G7 Summit in Quebec . And [ARGM-TMP: this time] [ARG0: Macron 's grip] [V: left] [ARG1: pale marks] [ARGM-LOC: on Trump 's hand] .
